price: 17. Ogaada inuu Allaah siiyo nolol arlada dhimashadeeda kaddib7. Waan idiin caddeynay Aayadaha si aad u fahantaan.
arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ قَدۡ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: 7. In sidoo kale Allaah Subxaanahu watacaalaa uu nooleyn karo qalbiga kaddib markuu noqday mid adag oo hanuunin karo qof horey u lunsanaa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: iʿ'lamū anna al-laha yuḥ'yī al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā qad bayyannā lakumu al-āyāti laʿallakum taʿqilūna
